results.title: Metformin inhibits cell proliferation in SKM-1 cells via AMPK-mediated cell cycle arrest.
results.text_hl: The present study aimed to investigate the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @CELLLINE_CVCL:0098 @@@SKM-1@@@ cells (an @DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid_Acute @DISEASE_MESH:D015470 @@@AML@@@-@<m>DISEASE_Myelodysplastic_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009190 @@@MDS@@@ cell line) and its underlying mechanisms.
